events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and related costs.
The application was reviewed and categorised under 'Personal Loan' due to medical-related purpose stated in the form.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to assist with the application and gather any further information needed.
The initial review of the submitted documents and application details identified no immediate issues or discrepancies.
Additional documents including medical bills and proof of income were requested to verify the necessity of the loan.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical invoices and employer salary statements.
Credit report was reviewed showing good credit history and timely repayments on previous loans and credit cards.
Risk analysis concluded that the applicant represents a low-risk borrower given their stable income and credit profile.
The final loan offer was presented, outlining the terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule tailored for the medical loan purpose.
The applicant provided positive feedback accepting the terms and expressed appreciation for the assistance during the process.
The loan approval was granted after verification of all documents and confirmation of applicant acceptance of terms.
Loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account to cover the planned medical treatment expenses.
A follow-up call was made to the applicant to ensure satisfaction and to offer support with any repayment queries.
The loan application case was officially closed after successful disbursement and follow-up with the applicant.
